00011 void Repl::run(Enviroment env) {

00013 
00014     while (cin.good()) {

00016         string command = this->getline(cin);
00017

00024 string Repl::getline(istream&is) {
00025     string str;
00026     char chr = 0;
00027     while (is.good() && chr != '\n') {
00028         chr = is.get();
00029         str.push_back(chr);
00030     }
00031 
00032     return str;
00033 }

00036 void printTraceback(BaseException e) {
00037     cout << "---------------------------------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00038     cout << "Trackback:" << endl;
00039     for (list<LFunction*>::iterator it = e.functions.begin(); it != e.functions.end(); it++) {
00040         if ((*it)->name != "") {
00041             cout << "> " << (*it)->name << ": ";
00042 
00043             if ((*it)->line) {
00044                 cout << "on line " << (*it)->line << " ";
00045             }
00046             cout << endl;
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }

00051 Elem * evalProgram(Enviroment * env, LList * program) {
00052     try {
00053         return env->progn(program);     // zkus program vykonat
00054     } catch (NameException e) {         // a kdyz se to nepovede napis co se stalo:
00055 
00056         if (!e.functions.empty()) {
00057             printTraceback(e);
00058         }
00059         cout << "NameError: " << e.desc << " ";
00060         if (e.line) {
00061             cout << "on line " << e.line << ". ";
00062         }
00063 
00064         cout << endl;
00065     } catch (BaseException e) { //vyjimky poskytuji v .desc dostatek informací.
00066         cout << "ERROR: " << e.desc << endl;
00067         if (!e.functions.empty()) {
00068             printTraceback(e);
00069         }
00070     }
00071     return NULL;
00072 }

00074 Elem * proccessFile(Enviroment& env, string filename) {
00075     Parser p;
00076     try {
00077         ifstream stdlibStream(filename.c_str(), ifstream::in);
00078         LList* stdlib = p.parseStream(stdlibStream);
00079         return evalProgram(&env, stdlib);
00080     } catch (IOException e) {
00081         cout << "lisp: Can't open file " << filename << ": No such file or directory" << endl;
00082         return NULL;
00083     } catch (SyntaxException e) {
00084 
00085         cout << e.desc << " in file " << filename << " on line " << e.line << endl;
00086     }
00087     return NULL;    //v případě chyby
00088 }
